data.title: Movie Scores/Soundtracks and Composers Discussion
data.meta_description:
Your soundtrack collection is not complete without these:

Conan the Barbarian


The Thing


Escape From New York
data.text:
So! my first Soundtrack ever was the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles First movie which my dad bought when it came out Still have it but its not mint

My first score was Trevor Rabin & Harry Gregson- Williams' Armageddon! This was an eye opener cause i had no clue that CDs of the instrumental music of the movies was been released on CDs! after that i was on top of the ____! and my collection began!

Cant really say i have a Fav composer because i just love so many!! For Example!

Alan Silvestri - Back to the Future, Predator, The Abyss, Back to the Future Part II, Predator 2, Back to the Future Part III, FernGully: The Last Rainforest, The Bodyguard, Super Mario Bros., Forrest Gump, Judge Dredd, Eraser, Contact, Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, Van Helsing, Identity, G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra

Basil Poledouris - Conan The Barbarian, Red Dawn, Conan The Destroyer, RoboCop, RoboCop 3, Starship Troopers,

Brian Tyler - Timeline, Children of Dune, Godsend, Paparazzi, War, Annapolis, The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift, Constantine, The Greatest Game Ever Played, Law Abiding Citizen, Fast & Furious, Eagle Eye, Bangkok Dangerous, Rambo, Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem

BT - Fast and the Furious

Brad Fiedel - The Terminator, Terminator 2: Judgment Day, True Lies, Johnny Mnemonic

Clint Mansell - Pi, Requiem for a Dream, Doom, The Fountain, Smokin' Aces, The Wrestler, Moon

Clinton Shorter - District 9

Charlie Clouser - Saw, Saw II, Saw III, Saw IV, Resident Evil: Extinction

Christopher Young - Swordfish, The Shipping News, The Glass House, Spider-Man 2, Drag Me to Hell

Craig Armstrong - The Incredible Hulk, The Clearing

Danny Elfman - Batman, Mission Impossible, Spiderman, Hulk, Big Fish, The Kingdom, Wanted, Hellboy II

Dario Marianelli - V for Vendetta

Davin Julyan - Memento, Insomnia, The Descent

David Newman - The Brave Little Toaster, Anastasia, Brokedown Palace, Ice Age, Serenity, The Spirit

David Arnold - Stargate, Independence Day, Godzilla, Four Brothers, Casino Royal, Quantum of Solace

Eric Serra - La Femme Nikita, The Big Blue, Leon (The Professional), The Fifth Element, Wasabi

Graeme Revell - The Crow, From Dusk Till Dawn, The Crow: City of Angels, Spawn, The Saint, The Insider, Pitch Black, Red Planet, Titan A.E., Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, Blow, Collateral Damage, Freddy Vs. Jason, Out of Time, The Chronicles of Riddick, Aeon Flux

Geoff Zanelli - Hitman, Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End, Disturbia, Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest, Secret Window, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl, The Last Samurai, Equilibrium, The Time Machine

Hans Zimmer - Rain Man, Thelma & Louise, Backdraft, Point Of No Return, Sniper, The Lion King, The Rock, Broken Arrow, The Prince of Egypt, The Thin Red Line, Gladiator, Mission: Impossible II, The Road to El Dorado, Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron, Black Hawk Down, Tears of the Sun, The Last Samurai, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl, King Arthur, Batman Begins, Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest, The Da Vinci Code, Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End, Kung Fu Panda, The Dark Knight, Sherlock Holmes, Angels & Demons, Call of duty: Modern Warfare 2

Harry Gregson-Williams - The Rock, Armageddon, Spy Game, Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty, Phone Booth, Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas, Team America: World Police, The Rundown, Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, Man on Fire, Kingdom of Heaven, The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch and The Wardrobe, Deja Vu, Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots, Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare, The Number 23, X-Men Origins: Wolverine

Howard Shore - Lord of the Rings Trilogy, A History of Violance

Ilan Eshkeri - The Insider, Stardust

James Horner - Commando, An American Tail, Aliens, *Batteries Not Included, Willow, Red Heat, The Land Before Time, Field Of Dreams, The Rocketeer, An American Tail: Fievel Goes West, We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story, Brave Heart, Balto, Courage Under Fire, Titanic, Deep Impact, Enemy at the Gates, The Forgotten, Troy, Apocalypto, The Boy in the Striped Pajamas, Avatar

James Newton Howard - Waterworld, The Postman, The Sixth Sense, Dinosaur, Unbreakable, Signs, Dreamcatcher, The Village, Hidalgo, Collateral, King Kong, Batman Begins, Lady in the Water, Blood Diamond, I am Legend, The Dark Night

Jerry Goldsmith - Alien, First Blood, Gremlins, Rambo: First Blood Part II, Legend, Innerspace, Rambo III, Gremlins 2: The New Batch, Powder, Congo, Total Recall, The mummy, The 13th Warrior, The Last Castle

John Barry - Dances with Wolves

John Debney - The Passion of the Christ, The End of Days

John Morphy - Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels, Snatch, 28 Days Later…, Miami Vice, 28 Weeks Later…, Sunshine, The Last House on the Left

John Powell - Face/Off, The Road to El Dorado, The Bourne Identity, Paycheck, The Italian Job, The Bourne Supremacy, X-Men: The Last Stand, The Bourne Ultimatum, P.S. I Love You, Jumper, Kung Fu Panda, Hancock

John Williams - to many.

Klaus Badelt - The Time Machine, Equilibrium, The Recruit, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl, The Promise, Constantine, Redline, TMNT, Premonition, Heaven and Earth, Killshot, Rescue Dawn, 16 Blocks, Miami Vice, Poseidon, Ultraviolet

Lisa Gerrard - The Insider, Gladiator, Tears of the Sun

Lisa Coleman - Heores

Marco Beltrami - Scream, Scream 2, Resident Evil, Blade II, Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines, I Robot, Hellboy, The Hurt Locker, 3:10 to Yuma, Live Free or Die Hard

Mark Isham - Blade, Life as a House, Reservation Road, The Mist

Martin O' Donnell - Halo: Combat Evolved, Halo 2, Halo 3, Halo 3: ODST

Michael Suby - The Butterfly Effect

Michael Giacchino -Alias, Lost, The Incredibles, Mission: Impossible III, Ratatouille, Up, Star Trek

Michael Kamen - Pink Floyd The Wall, The Dead Zone, Brazil, Lethal Weapon, Die Hard, Die Hard 2, Robin Hood: Prince Of Thieves, Last Action Hero, Die Hard with a Vengeance, Event Horizon, What Dreams May Come, The Iron Giant, Band of Brothers

Nick Cave - The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford

Paul Haslinger - Underworld, Into the Blue, Shoot 'Em Up, Death Race, Underworld : Rise of the Lycans

Paul Oakenfold - Swordfish

Randy Edelman - Dragonheart, The Last Of The Mohicans

Randy Newman - James And The Giant Peach, Toy Story, A Bug's Life, Toy Story 2, Monsters Inc., Cars, The Princess and the Frog

Rupert Gregson-Williams - Hotel Rwanda, King Arthur

Stephen Barton - Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare

Steve Jablonsky - Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty, Tears of the Sun, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl, Steamboy, The Island, The Texas Chainsaw Massacre, The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning, The Hitcher, Transformers, Gears of War 2, Friday the 13th, Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen

Trevor Rabin - Con Air, Deep Blue Sea, Armageddon, Enemy of the State, Gone in Sixty Seconds, Remember the Titans, The One, Bad Boys II,

Trevor Jones - The Dark Crystal, The Last Of The Mohicans,

Thomas Newman - The Shawshank Redemption, Phenomenon, Meet Joe Black, Pay It Forward, American Beauty, The Green Mile, The Horse Whisperer, Road to Perdition, Wall-E, Revolutionary Raod

Tyler Bates - Watchmen, The Day the Earth Stood Still, Doomsday, 300
